channel.title: Project Rune-Newbie V1
channel.description:
[b]I am not Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS. I am just Hello RSPS.[/b]
[size=18pt][b]PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE![/b][/size]
Hello guys, and welcome to my release from my first source ever made. Ive coded all this by myself.
[size=12pt][b]Please dont flame, serious, this is my first work.[/b][/size]
Im coding a lil more, so i yes im bussy with making a v2. With much more features. I know that this isnt [b]THAT[/b] good. But i think that i did a good job. If u dont like it dont bother me and write bad comments. This is based on a blank source, so once again ive coded this all by myself. Ive never coded before.
So here i go...
[b]Lets starts with the pics, shall we?[/b]
Home, never seened before.
[img]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/376/runenewbiesourcehome.jpg[/img]
Shops.
[img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/4481/runenewbiesourceshops.jpg[/img]
Bank at home.
[img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/8056/runenewbiesourcebank.jpg[/img]
Train (Not fully coded yet, will be finished in v2).
[img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/6751/runenewbiesourcetrain.jpg[/img]
Pkzone (U can attk everywhere, change if you want).
[img]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/7029/runenewbiesourcepk.jpg[/img]
Skiller Zone.
[img]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/9915/runenewbiesourceskiller.jpg[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/8736/runenewbiesourcelog.jpg[/img]
Staffzone.
[img]http://img410.imageshack.us/img410/3356/runenewbiesourcestaffzo.jpg[/img] [img]http://img376.imageshack.us/img376/5725/runenewbiesourcestaffsh.jpg[/img]
THANK YOU [img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/8306/runenewbiesource1.jpg[/img]
That was my first source. Im proud of it.
Hope u guyz like it, almost forgot download link..
Download link source: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=01JPBHWC http://uppit.com/v/28v5tmzj http://www.mediafire.com/?m2lymzz5zm2 Client: Use silabsoft, moparscape all will work.

I guess it’s decent for a first source…

item.title: Project Rune-Newbie V1
item.dc:creator: @Ryan317 Ryan317
item.description:
@Ryan317 wrote:

[quote=“WestSideMass, post:2, topic:334903”]This is not flaming, I know it’s your first release, but you have to learn this as soon as possible…

1.) People don’t like servers customed that much.
2.) Staff shops are pointless, they get bribed by players to get the items.

Other than that, good job.[/quote]

Those are both opinions, and great job for a first time.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rune-Newbie V1
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You made seperate method for each herb, like so:

public void avantoeSeed()
	{
	if(playerLevel[19] >= 65)
		{
		addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[19]), 19);
		addItem(261, 1);
		pEmote = 0x831;
		deleteItem(5298, getItemSlot(5298), 1);
		sendMessage("You put the seed on the patch and get an herb");
		}
		else if(playerLevel[19] < 65)
		{
			sendMessage("You need atleast 65 farming to plant this!");
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rune-Newbie V1
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:7, topic:334903”]Just a suggestion.

public void plantSeed(int seed, int herb, int levelReq) { if(playerLevel[19] >= levelReq) { addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[19]), 19); addItem(herb, 1); pEmote = 0x831; deleteItem(seed, getItemSlot(seed), 1); sendMessage("You carefully plant the " + getItemName(seed) +"."); } else { sendMessage("You need atleast " + levelReq.toString() + " farming to plant this!"); } } [/quote]

For the skiller zone, or…?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rune-Newbie V1
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Just a suggestion.

public void plantSeed(int seed, int herb, int levelReq)
{
	if(playerLevel[19] >= levelReq)
	{
		addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[19]), 19);
		addItem(herb, 1);
		pEmote = 0x831;
		deleteItem(seed, getItemSlot(seed), 1);
		sendMessage("You carefully plant the " + getItemName(seed) +".");
	}
	else
	{
		sendMessage("You need atleast " + levelReq.toString() + " farming to plant this!");
	}
}

Read full topic
